Class TaskFailover

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.engine.tasks.manager.singlequeue.TaskFailover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.TreeCacheListener

    public class TaskFailover
extends Object
implements org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.TreeCacheListener, AutoCloseable

    Re-schedule tasks that were running when an instance of Engine failed

    Author:
    Denis lobanov

      We want to requeue anything that is not on one of the currently running engines
